rows.label: qst005601_msg001
rows.name:
I guess just blind guessing isn't
going to get us very far...

rows.label: qst005601_msg002
rows.name:
Maybe if we tried it enough times
we'd hit on a solution eventually,
but it would take quite a while.

rows.label: qst005601_msg003
rows.name: Yeah, that doesn't sound like much fun.

rows.label: qst005601_msg004
rows.name:
If the key to this tablet lies
anywhere, it will probably be
in some kind of ancient tome.

rows.label: qst005601_msg005
rows.name:
That would make sense. Perhaps
it would be quicker if we found
the appropriate texts first.

rows.label: qst005601_msg006
rows.name:
Could I ask for a bit of help
from the mercenaries, too?

rows.label: qst005601_msg007
rows.name:
Of course! Let's find
whatever clues we can to
unlock this tablet's mystery!
